entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Further Studies 2000. Further study plans of secondary school students before graduation in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E39: TÁRKI Further Studies 2000. Further study plans of secondary school students before graduation in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09

entry.dcterms:description: plans to continue studies, getting a job, salary expectations
entry.dcterms:subject: working conditions
labour and employment
political institutions, public administration
education, school
social stratification and groupings
income, property and savings
person
survey data
cross-section

Out of 1192 secondary schools 60 was randomly selected in a way that the number of students taking the final exams would be 5500. In the selected schools all students from the last year (year 12) were interviewed, so in the end - after leaving out the non-existing addresses and those refusing to answer - 4980 students were selected from 77 classes.
self-administered questionnaire
A
